luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b1.setvida: Â§4Â§lApiglo, Lord of the Piglin Empire
Â§6- â˜… Â§6Â§lÂ§oGlaivorus, Devourer of BladesÂ§6 â˜… -
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b1.dialogo: Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Enough playing around!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Let the knights attack and end these intruders!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e But... I wanted to do it, my emperor!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Calm down, Glaivorus, and enjoy the view from up here.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c This is what happens when you challenge the emperor!
<Echo of Koros>
Talk to me before facing Apiglo. I'm back here!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Glaivorus! Show these insolent intruders why I'm the emperor!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e Gladly, my emperor!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e It shall be a pleasure to listen their screams of agony when I cut their innards out!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c It's clear that if you want to do something...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c You have to do it yourself!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Glaivorus, kill them! Now!!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e Worry not, my emperor.
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e I will spread their guts on the floor!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c I need... a rest...
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e I'm sorry, emperor, I couldn't...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c SILENCE!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e ...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Servants! You better end them right now!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c I'm... Sick! of you.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c I will end you here and now!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Glaivorus... Don't you dare fail me now.
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e As you command... Emperor...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Glaivorus you are USELESS! Why are they still alive?!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e It is you who are nothing without MY power.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c How dare you say such a thing! I am the EMPEROR!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Glaivorus>Â§e You don't need me? Very well, I'll leave them to you!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c No... NO! Glaivorus, come back! I COMMAND you!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Wait! Please, don't kill me!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c W-we can negotiate.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c I can grant you unthinkable power if you let me live!
End him! Without his blade, he's completely defenseless.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Apliglo>Â§c Be ready to scream!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b1.h1.msg_: From now on the Â§esafe areaÂ§f will not be markedÂ§f with particles!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b1.h4.msg_: There wasn't a player in each Â§bBlade of TormentÂ§f! You have suffered Â§cdamageÂ§f.
There must be a player in each area of the Â§bBlades of TormentÂ§f. Quick!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b2.recompe: Â§9Product of Thar Kroo's sacrifice in order to defeat
Â§9the Conqueror. A symbol of hope. Perhaps someone
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b2.dialogo: Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Koros... we have failed. The universe is doomed... Because of me.
I'm sorry, Creator.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Very well...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You shall feel the heat of a thousand stars!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Very smart!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c But is it enough?
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I see I wasn't underestimating you.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Get ready!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c It is over!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Prove to me I'm not mistaken with you!
Warning! In this phase Thar Kroo will cast Â§6Flaming FieldÂ§f Â§ctwiceÂ§f as many times!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c It's the moment of truth!
Fire will soon spread! Seek for a safe place among the flames!
Thar Kroo... My creator... He sacrificed to grant us the Â§cred coreÂ§f, and his Â§epowerÂ§f...
The Conqueror Â§ewill notÂ§f be able to Â§edominateÂ§f your minds!
We cannot fail now, you are the only spark of hope that exists.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Enough!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You have surpassed all my challenges.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I know you're worthy, and I trust you with the future of the galaxy.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c When you complete the monument with the cosmic cores, you will be able to travel to Â§oParadox CitadelÂ§rÂ§c.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You will be on his territory, and I... won't be able to come with you.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c He can dominate your minds, but I shall grant you a fragment of me to resist his control.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I hope that, in name of peace, my sacrifice shan't be in vain!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I hope that all lives I destroyed can forgive me.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Koros... you have guided them here...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Guide them to a better future.
I will not mistake you... Creator.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You have finally arrived.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I've been waiting for a long time.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c And know you shall know the truth...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I... am Â§lThe ConquerorÂ§rÂ§c.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Or at least, I used to.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Years ago, when I was young, they conquered my natal world, killing nigh all members of my species.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c That very day I swore to seek revenge.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I would conquer and bring peace to this galaxy, so that no one else ever had to suffer what my species suffered.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c My methods were detestable, as you have seen. I was sure the end would justify the means.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Invasions, Blackfire... However, the worst would come later.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c After stealing knowledge from Â§eEotharÂ§c, dominating Â§eAphofisÂ§c and reuniting all Â§eCosmic CoresÂ§c I learnt how to Â§etravel in timeÂ§c.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c With this power I became invincible and reached my revenge.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c I unified galaxy and obtained peace... Or so I thought.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c With time, I noticed that my own society was a ruthless empire.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c And in the end... I annihilated everything.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Full of regret, I traveled to the past seeking heroes that could right my wrongs.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c You shall be who stop my younger self in your present, before he dominates Â§eAphofisÂ§c and completes the first travel in time.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Otherwise, it shall be too late.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c But first...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c Face me!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Thar Kroo>Â§c And prove to me you are strong enough to receive my power!
Talk to me before facing Thar Kroo! There are things you must know...
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b3.dialogo: Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eFinally! Test subjects!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eI've missed testing on human flesh!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eDamn junk... Good for nothing!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eThis... This must not be!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eW-who will continue my research if I'm gone?
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eI've failed you, T...
Good job, heroes. I was very worried when the Conqueror appeared.
You've been witness of a fragment of his power... And he almost destroys you...
There is much more fighting up ahead...
Talk to me before facing Ectron! I know how you can beat him.
Walk between the coils!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eThe experiment has been a total success!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eSoon even the Conqueror will pale in comparison to my power!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eCome close! It won't hurt! I promise...Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eI will scorch your flesh, until you're nothing but embers!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eCan you feel the charge?!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eLet's see how you fare against these toys!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eMind your footing!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eEnough experiments!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eIt is time to carbonize these lab rats!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eWell! Seems like the lab rats do know how to run!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron>
Â§eI move through entropy.
Â§eCatch me, if you can...
Â§eI'm intangible like energy.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<Ectron>
Â§cThe towers grant me unlimited power!
Â§cWhile I have energy from the towers... I'm invincible!
Â§cPower towers! Grant me your energy!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§7Â§o(Panting)
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eCurses!
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eThis cannot be...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cEnough!Â§c
Â§6Â§oÂ§l<Ectron> Â§eEmperor!?
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cEctron... It's embarrasing, that I must come to your aid...
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cInsects!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cPeace is the most noble of causes, and your weak minds cannot grasp it.
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cThat is why you deserve to be squashed like worms!
Â§4Â§oÂ§l<The Conqueror> Â§cAnd if you cannot...
